item.title: 微软在人工智能浏览器上再次向 OpenAI 发起 "我也是 "挑战
item.description: 欢迎收看 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日通讯。今天，奥斯汀-卡尔（Austin Carr）将报道微软在人工智能领域的竞争。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Austin Carr reports on the frenemy AI competition in which Microsoft is always playing second fiddle to OpenAI.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦在物价上涨后维持关键利率不变
item.description: 巴基斯坦中央银行在连续第四次会议上保持利率稳定，表明在近期洪水破坏农作物并推高南亚国家食品价格的情况下将保持谨慎。【原文：Pakistan’s central bank kept interest rates steady for a fourth consecutive meeting, signaling caution as recent floods damaged crops and drove up food prices in the South Asian nation.】

item.title: 据说 Fractal Analytics 计划下月在印度首次公开募股 5.55 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Fractal Analytics 公司正准备最早于下月在印度启动首次公开募股，募集资金可能达到 490 亿卢比（约合 5.55 亿美元）。【原文：Fractal Analytics is preparing to kick off its initial public offering, which may fetch 49 billion rupees ($555 million), as early as next month in India, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 据说汉堡王所有者已将 CPE 和 HSG 列入收购中国股份的候选名单
item.description: 据知情人士透露，中国私募股权投资公司 HSG 和 CPE 正在争夺汉堡王中国业务的控股权。【原文：Chinese private equity firms HSG and CPE are vying for a controlling stake in Burger King’s China business, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 银行股大涨，西班牙股市创 18 年来首个纪录
item.description: 西班牙基准股票指数突破了 2007 年的历史收盘高点，银行主导的涨势推动了指数的上涨。【原文：Spain’s benchmark equity index topped an all-time closing high last seen in 2007 as a bank-led rally supercharged gains.】

item.title: 公牛队掌控全局，开启充实的一周
item.description:
美联储会议、大型科技公司财报显示投资者将面临一个潜在的波动期。【原文：

Fed meeting, Big Tech earnings point to a potentially volatile stretch for investors.

】

item.title: 美国水务公司将通过全股票交易收购 Essential Utilities 公司
item.description: 美国水务公司（American Water Works Co.【原文：American Water Works Co. agreed to buy Essential Utilities Inc. in an all-stock deal, to create a water company with about $40 billion market capitalization.】

item.title: 习近平与特朗普峰会前中国放缓大豆采购
item.description: 全球市场都在等待美国总统唐纳德-特朗普和中国国家主席习近平之间的会晤，以重振两国之间的大豆贸易。【原文：Chinese buyers are holding back on soybean deals as global markets wait for a meeting between US President Donald Trump and Chinese President Xi Jinping that could revive trade in the crop between the two nations.】

item.title: 中美最新贸易停战未解决根本问题
item.description: 中美贸易谈判代表已为唐纳德-特朗普和习近平在本周的峰会上公布了一系列外交成果。这些轻而易举的成果令投资者欣喜不已，但更深层次的核心冲突却悬而未决。【原文：Chinese and US trade negotiators have lined up an array of diplomatic wins for Donald Trump and Xi Jinping to unveil at a summit this week. Those easy hits are pleasing investors, but leave deeper core conflicts unresolved.】

item.title: 塞舌尔和毛里求斯仍是非洲最佳投资目的地
item.description: 根据贷款机构RMB周一发布的《投资非洲何处去》报告，塞舌尔和毛里求斯继续保持非洲最具吸引力投资目的地的排名，超过了埃及、南非和摩洛哥等较大的经济体。【原文：Seychelles and Mauritius retained their ranking as Africa’s most attractive investment destinations, outperforming larger economies, including Egypt, South Africa and Morocco, according to a report published on Monday on Where to Invest in Africa from lender RMB.】

item.title: 主动型基金经理患上 "泡沫恐惧症"，阿尔法效应逐渐消失
item.description: 活跃的选股者将华尔街关于人工智能泡沫的警告铭记于心，在科技股对大盘的控制力空前强大的情况下，他们缩减了对科技股的投资。【原文：Active stock pickers have taken Wall Street’s warnings about an AI bubble to heart, scaling back their exposure to technology high-flyers amid the group’s unprecedented grip on the broader market.】

item.title: 美国加速制定稳定币规则，加拿大也在加速制定稳定币规则
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，加拿大正在就稳定币规则进行磋商，并可能在下周的联邦预算中宣布一项重大更新。【原文：Canada is consulting on rules for stablecoins and may announce a major update in the federal budget next week, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 布洛克称澳大利亚央行将决定是否降息以促进就业
item.description: 澳大利亚储备银行行长米歇尔-布洛克（Michele Bullock）在一个经济学家论坛上发表评论时说，澳大利亚货币政策委员会将不得不决定是进一步降低利率以支持劳动力市场，还是按兵不动以维持通胀下行压力。【原文：Australia’s monetary policy board will have to decide whether to lower interest rates further to support the labor market or stand pat in order to maintain downward pressure on inflation, Reserve Bank Governor Michele Bullock said in comments to an economists’ forum.】

item.title: 菲律宾央行行长称是时候从黄金中获利了
item.description: 一位政策制定者表示，随着避险需求的缓解，贵金属将从历史高位进一步回落，菲律宾央行应出售部分 "过度 "持有的黄金。【原文：The Philippine central bank should sell some of its “excessive” gold holdings with the precious metal set to retreat further from record highs as safe-haven demand eases, according to a policymaker.】

item.title: 德国商业信心跃升至 2022 年以来最高水平
item.description: 第四季度伊始，德国企业信心指数升至 2022 年以来的最高水平，为欧洲最大经济体最终摆脱两年萎缩带来了希望。【原文：German business confidence improved to its highest level since 2022 at the start of the fourth quarter, bolstering hopes that Europe’s largest economy is finally emerging from two years of contraction.】

item.title: 希诺基上调利润展望，原因是艾滋病特许权使用费和海外业务增长
item.description: Shionogi & Co.提高了全年利润指导，因为其艾滋病治疗产品的预期特许权使用费超过了之前的预期。【原文：Shionogi & Co. lifted its full-year profit guidance as expected royalties from its HIV treatment surpass prior expectations.】

item.title: 保时捷首席财务官预示明年将迎来更美好的时光后，保时捷股价上涨
item.description: 保时捷股份公司（Porsche AG）在新任首席执行官上任后，誓言扭转数月来的糟糕业绩，并改变了电动车战略的方向，从而获得了上涨。【原文：Porsche AG gained after the company vowed to reverse months of poor performance with a new chief executive officer and changed course on its EV strategy.】

item.title: 东京证券交易所加强审查，日本电产面临退市风险
item.description: 日本电产株式会社已经深陷会计危机，在东京证券交易所表示将对该公司实施特别监管后，该公司现在面临被除名的风险。【原文：Nidec Corp., already mired in a deepening accounting crisis, now faces the risk of being deslisted after the Tokyo Stock Exchange said it will apply special oversight to the company.】

item.title: <strong>为什么美国建房仍然如此昂贵</strong
item.description:
模块化住宅的问题。【原文：

The problem with modular housing.

】

item.title: 奇数地块：美国建房成本为何如此之高（播客）
item.description: 奇数地块：美国建房成本为何如此之高（播客）【原文：Odd Lots: Why It’s So Costly to Build Homes in America (Podcast)】

item.title: 贸易乐观情绪占据上风，国债全线下跌
item.description: 随着避险需求减弱，中美即将达成贸易协议的乐观情绪促使投资者抛售国债。【原文：Optimism the US and China are nearing a trade deal is prompting investors to sell Treasuries as demand for havens wanes.】

item.title: 历史性市场挤压缓解，白银租赁价格骤降
item.description: 伦敦的白银借贷成本已从历史高位回落，这表明市场的流动性已有所恢复，本月早些时候的挤压有所缓解。【原文：The cost of borrowing silver in London has retreated from a record high, a sign that greater liquidity has returned to the market and brought some relief from a squeeze earlier this month.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数落后于欧洲涨势，英镑保持稳定
沃达丰 Idea 的股价因印度最高法院允许重新审查应付款而上涨
item.description: 印度最高法院允许联邦政府重新考虑沃达丰集团（Vodafone Group Plc）旗下陷入困境的本地合资企业过去拖欠的数十亿美元债务，这点燃了这家亏损无线运营商的复兴希望。【原文：India’s top court allowed the federal government to reconsider billions in past dues owed by Vodafone Group Plc’s struggling local venture, stoking revival hopes for the loss-making wireless operator that has been weighed down by this lingering dispute.】

item.title: 贝森特在年底决策前提名美联储主席最终人选
item.description: 财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周一确认了美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）继任者的五位最终人选，总统表示他预计将在年底前做出决定。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent on Monday confirmed the names of five finalists to succeed Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell, with the president saying he expected to make his decision by year-end.】

item.title: 荷兰大选前，Nexperia 的风波加剧了企业的焦虑情绪
item.description: 荷兰选民本周投票时，结果很可能是议会四分五裂，没有一个政党接近多数。这将意味着漫长的联合讨价还价，使荷兰在一段时间内陷入看守政府的困境。【原文：When Dutch voters go to the polls this week, the outcome is likely to be a fractured parliament with no party close to a majority. That will mean lengthy coalition haggling, leaving the country stuck with a caretaker government for some time.】

item.title: 荷兰金融科技公司 Bunq 获准成为美国经纪商
item.description: 荷兰金融科技公司 Bunq BV 表示，它获得了美国监管机构颁发的经纪商执照，从而使这家在线银行能够在拓展国际业务的同时向客户提供证券交易服务。【原文：Dutch fintech Bunq BV said it received regulatory approval for a broker-dealer license in the US, allowing the online bank to offer securities trading to customers as it expands internationally.】

item.title: 比罗尔称，石油供应过剩将 "缓和 "近期上涨后的油价
item.description: 据国际能源机构称，由于供应充足，预计石油价格将 "趋缓"。【原文：Oil prices are expected to “moderate” because of ample supply, according to the International Energy Agency.】

item.title: 巴克莱银行在退出业务 11 年后重新进入沙特阿拉伯
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）正在重新进军沙特阿拉伯，成为在这个石油资源丰富、正在实施万亿美元经济转型计划的王国加强业务的最新一家银行。【原文：Barclays Plc is re-entering Saudi Arabia, becoming the latest bank to beef up operations in the oil-rich kingdom that’s in the midst of a trillion-dollar economic transformation plan.】

item.title: 印尼股市因担心 MSCI 权重变化而下跌
item.description: 在摩根士丹利资本国际公司（MSCI Inc.【原文：Indonesian stocks tumbled by their most in over six months after an MSCI Inc. consultation paper raised concerns about a potential re-weighting of local shares.】
